channel.description: Appendix B: Sample RHCSA Exam 2** Time Duration: 3 hours Passing Score: 70% (210 out of 300) Instructions: The RHCSA exam, EX200, is offered electronically on a physical computer running RHEL 8. The computer has two virtual machines with RHEL 8 running in each one of them. The exam presents two sets of tasks that are to be completed within the stipulated time in the identified virtual machine. Firewall and SELinux need to be considered.
